En el grupo “AHORRAR ES ÉXITO” cumple la función de presidenta quien fue elegida por los  socios. Los socios del mencionado grupo se encuentran pasando el 03 ciclo. Jenny invertirá el préstamo en la compra de gaseosas, azúcar arroz y aceite. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Jenny es la segunda del lado izquierdo.
texts.en: Jenny is a 53-year-old single mother. For the past 15 years she has made a living selling drinks and primary-need products, while at the same time selling clothes on order from customers. She is president of the "Ahorrar es Éxito" ("Saving is Success") group as elected by her fellow members. The group is in its third loan cycle. Jenny plans to use the loan to purchase soft drinks, sugar, rice and oil. The group thanks Kiva lenders for the loan. Jenny is second on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, rice, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Norma Olga

texts.es: Norma, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. Ella tiene 17 años de dedicarse a la venta de abarrotería como ser repuestos de bicicleta, achineria y la venta de productos alimenticios como ser arroz, harina, azúcar, churros, pan, refrescos, productos enlatados, etc. Doña Norma lleva 8 ciclos de préstamos en ODEF, con el actual, los cuales ha invertido para mantener estable su negocio. El préstamo que ha solicitado es  por 20,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de plásticos como lavamanos, cubetas, vasos, platos, panas y otros, con el propósito de obtener muy buenas ganancias. Su meta es salir adelante con su familia y también obtener gracias a los créditos que le ha dado ODEF.
texts.en: Norma, 44, is married and has 4 children with whom she lives in the town of Tocoa in the state of Colon. She has been selling goods for 17 years, including bicycle repairs, low-cost items and food like rice, flour, sugar, chips, bread, sodas, canned goods, etc. Norma has been through 8 loan cycles with ODEP, including this one, and she has invested them in keeping her business stable. She asks for 20,000 lempiras to purchase plastic goods like sinks, trays, cups, plates, bowls and other things, with the goal of making good profits. Her objective is to help her family get ahead, thanks to the loans that ODEF has given her.

loans.use: to buy plastic goods like trays, sinks, cups, plates, etc to sell.

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
José, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para continuar con el cultivo de maíz y frijol; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar los materiales agrícolas oportunos, tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, entre otros.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a fortalecer el negocio y con las ganancias a podido ayudar a su familia. Su deseo es seguir cultivando la tierra y apoyar a su familia con la alimentación.
texts.en: José is in need of another loan because he requires more working capital to continue growing corn and beans. This investment will help him purchase timely farming supplies like fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and other items. The previous loan helped strengthen the business, and with the profits he was able to help his family. His desire is to keep cultivating his land and feeding his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and other products.

loans.name: Elder Oney

texts.es: Elder, tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltero y vive con su Madre, Abuela y sus tres hermanos en el municipio de Omoa. El tiene mas de 5 años de tener este negocio de una Barbería, este negocio lo tiene en un local que alquila. Ofrece los servicios de corte de cabello, corte de cejas, barba para caballeros y corte de pelo para niños. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo, este es por 12,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de cremas, gillette, talcos y peines para uso de la Barbería.  Este préstamo lo ayudara a mantener en buen estado la maquinaria  que se utiliza en la barbería y su objetivo es crecer en el negocio y ayudar a sus padres.
texts.en: Elder, 24, is single and lives with his mother, grandmother and three brothers in the town of Omoa. He has been working in a barbershop for more than 5 years, in a space that he rents. He offers hair cuts, eyebrow trims, shaving for men and haircuts for kids. He is asking for a second loan, this one for 12,000 lempiras, to invest in the purchase of shaving cream, razors, talc, and combs to use in the barbershop. This loan will help him to keep his machinery in good shape. His objective is to grow this business and help out his parents.

loans.use: to buy shaving creams, talc, combs, razors and other things for a barbershop.

loans.name: David Ascencion

texts.es:
David, está acompañado y disfruta de dos hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad, no tiene familiares en el extranjero. El, se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de granos básicos, tales como: frijol y maíz, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 12 años y lo trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm, hasta el momento no presenta ningún problema.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, entre otros. Esta inversión le ayudara a adquirir todos los materiales agrícolas de una sola vez para el cultivo.
Su sueño es mejorar su propia casa y ofrecerle una mejora calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
David's married and has two children, ages 3 and 5.  He has no family members living abroad.

David makes a living in agriculture growing staples such as beans and corn.  He has done this job for 12 years and he works every day from 6 a.m. until 3 p.m.  He has had no problems thus far.

The loan he's requesting will allow him to buy the agricultural inputs he needs, such as soil amendments, herbicide, insecticide, pesticide, and others.  This investment will help him acquire all the agricultural supplies for his crop at the same time.

His dream is to improve his own house and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, herbicide, insecticide, pesticide, and other supplies

loans.name: Katerin

texts.es:
Katerin tiene 18 años y vive junto a su esposo David en su casa propia. Katerin tiene una pequeña tienda de productos comestibles en un ambiente muy acogedor del primer piso de sus vivienda, Lleva con esta labor casi un año desde su apertura y vio que es una buena manera de obtener ingresos así como en el campo. Comenta que optó por el negocio de productos ya que sentía que el campo era una actividad muy complicada para ella y porque deseaba darle toda la atención posible a su esposo. Al ubicarse en una zona algo lejana a la capital de su distrito los víveres y otros productos que vende tienen buena demanda siendo uno de ellos el azúcar, arroz, huevos, conservas de pescado enlatado entre otros además de golosinas y productos para el cuidado personal. Lo que mas le agrada de su trabajo es que le permite conocer muchas personas y hacerse muy querida a la vez. 
Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida de recibir un apoyo financiero que le permita seguir adelante. En está ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería al por mayor para su negocio y donde esta incluido los víveres de primera necesidad como sacos de arroz, azúcar, cereales, conservas enlatadas entre otros.
texts.en: Katerin is 18 and lives with her husband, David, in their own home. She has a small grocery store in a very friendly environment on the first floor of her home. She opened the business about a year ago and saw it was as good a way to earn an income as in the field. She said that she decided to sell groceries because she felt that working in the field was more complicated for her since she wanted to give her husband as much attention as possible. She lives in an area somewhat far from the district capital, so the groceries and other products she sells are in high demand, among which are sugar, rice, eggs, canned goods, snacks and personal-care products. What she likes most about her job is that it allows her to meet and get to know a lot of people. This is her first Kiva loan and she feels grateful to receive financial support to help her make headway. She is requesting the loan to purchase wholesale supplies for her business, including primary-need products like rice, sugar, grains, canned goods and other items.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, grains, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Jairo Santiago

texts.es:
Jairo, está casado y disfruta de un hijo de 8 años, no recibe ayuda del extranjero. El, posee un comedor para generar ingresos y así para el sustento de su familia, lo realiza todos los días de 6:00am a 5:00pm.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar la materia prima, tales como: pescado, carnes, verduras, condimentos, entre otros. Esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar su negocio y aumentar la clientela.
Su sueño es brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is married and has an 8-year-old son. He doesn't receive any outside help. He has a canteen to earn income and in this way support his family. He works there every day from 6:00 am to 5:00 pm. 

The loan that he is seeking will allow him to purchase raw materials like: fish, meat, vegetables, condiments, etc. This investment will help him to improve his business and increase his customer base.

His dream is to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fish, meat, vegetables, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.fr:
Née en juin 1970 à BAMAKO, MARIAM vit avec ses 6 enfants et son époux dans une  famille monogame dans le quartier KANGARE de la ville de SELINGUE. 
MARIAM na pas eu la chance d’aller à l école,  très vite elle s’est  intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de l’encens et des  produits de beauté. Après avoir correctement remboursé les prêts précédents, MARIAM est à son septième  prêt avec Soro Yiriwaso qui sera utilisé pour acheter, une quantité  importante d’encens et des produits de beauté auprès des  grossistes à BAMAKO. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, à crédit et en détail dans sa boutique à KANGARE à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
MARIAM espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 125.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour   aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Born in June 1970 in Bamako, Mariam lives with her six children and her husband in a monogamous family in the Kangaré neighborhood of the city of Selingue.

Mariam has not had the chance to go to school. She quickly became interested in income-generating activities including the purchase and sale of incense and beauty products. 

Having fully repaid previous loans, Mariam is on her seventh loan with Soro Yiriwaso which will be used to buy a large quantity of incense and beauty products from wholesalers in Bamako. She sells retail for cash or credit at her shop in Kangaré, to a clientele composed of men and women.

Mariam hopes to make a monthly profit of 125,000 FCFA that will be used to help her husband provide for the family, pay the loan and reinvest in the business.

loans.use: buy various items

loans.name: Siah

texts.en:
Siah is 26 years old, and she is residing in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County. The county is located by the sea and is known for their beaches and fish. In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city.  

She is single and has four children aged between 7 months old and 10 years old; only three are in currently in school and living at home. For the past two years, she has been selling lapper (fabric) and slippers. A problem she faces is the rainy season. She started selling for her mother and later established her own business. She sells for six days in a week, spending nine hours on her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase lappa (fabric) and slippers for her business. Her plan is to build her house. She would like to thank the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase lappa (fabric) and slippers for her business.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
Please meet 21-year-old Patience from Liberia. To be precise, she lives in the community surrounding Airport. She is single with a 3-year-old child who lives at home and attends school. 

For the past two years, she has been selling cosmetics in the market. She started this business with money given to her by her fiancee and learned this way of selling from her mother. She sells from Monday to Saturday, spending eight hours on her business. 

She is appreciative of her business because it keeps her saving every day. Her plan is to build a house.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics for her business. She would like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
DANAYA est un regroupement de 8 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 45ans. Mariées avec six enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente d’habillements et de céréales à l’image de AMI qui est la première personne assise sur une chaise devant. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à DALABALA dans la sous préfecture de SELINGUE (Région de SIKASSO, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur quatrième  prêt solidaire. 
AMI, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à DALABALA, excelle dans la vente de céréales. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 10 sacs de riz et de maïs.  Elle s’approvisionne à DALABALA et environnants et vend ses céréales à DALABALA, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 35.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en: Danaya is a group of eight women who know each other through family and neighborhood ties.  Their average age is 45.  Married with six children, they engage in different businesses such as the sale of apparel and cereals like Ami, the person sitting on the chair in front.  They live in large traditional families in Dalabala in the sub-prefecture of Selingue in the region of Sikasso in the Republic of Mali.  They have been in business for the past few years and are very sought-after in their work.  In order to satisfy the needs of their growing customer base, the group members decided to join Soro Yiriwaso's loan program.  They are on their fourth group loan. Ami who is president of the group and very well-known in Dalabala, excels at the sale of cereals.  She plans to use her loan to buy 10 bags of rice and corn.  She stocks up in Dalabala and nearby and sells her cereals in Dalabala retail for cash and credit, to customers who are male and female.  She hopes for a monthly profit of 35,000 FCFA which will enable her to repay her loan and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Djrojesuton 1 Group

texts.fr: DJROJESUTON 1 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui font des tontines ensemble. La représente du groupe, nommée Ahigbé Pélagie (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 33 ans. Ahigbé Pélagie n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Ahigbé Pélagie est mariée à un marchand du nom de Narcisse. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble les charges du ménage. Pour ce faire, Ahigbé Pélagie exerce comme activité la vente des divers articles(savons, biscuits, lait etc.) dans sa région depuis huit temps. De façon secondaire, Ahigbé Pélagie des boissons. Ahigbé Pélagie s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de diversifier son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle Ahigbé Pélagie s’associe aux autres membres du groupe DJROJESUTON 1 pour solliciter un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Djrojesuton1 is a group consisting of three persons who are friends and participate together in tontines (rotating loan association). The group representative is Ahigbé Pelagie (the one raising her hand on the photo), who is 33 years old. 

Ahigbé Pelagie did not attend school. She married a merchant named Narcissus. The couple has one child attending school who is their dependent. The couple shares household expenses. 

To do this, Ahigbé Pelagie has been running a business in her area for the past eight years, selling various items (soap, biscuits, milk, etc..). Secondarily, Ahigbé Pelagie sells beverages. She resupplies in one of Benin's markets. 

In order to diversify her business and ensure customer loyalty, Ahigbé Pelagie, along with the other members of the Djrojesuton 1 group, is requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé. Previous loans have been repaid in full.

loans.use: Buy various items (soap, biscuits, milk, etc..)

loans.name: Benkadi I Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI I  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 6 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à MOUSSADJEBOUGOU, un des villages de OUELESSEBOUGOU, 2ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé a été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec   FATOUMATA , 1 ere assise de la gauche vers la droite  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1,5 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à OUELESSEBOUGOU, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 195.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The 10 members of the BENKADI I group are married women who average 45 years of age with six children, all living in polygamous families in Moussadjebougou, one of the villages in Ouelessebougou, second administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution  to carry out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their second loan with the institution, and the previous loan was repaid in full.

Fatoumata is the featured member, the first person sitting from left to right in the photo. She grows groundnuts.
With her ​​loan, she intends to buy inputs, seeds and pay tilling costs to maintain 1.5 hectares (3.7 acres).

Production is sold after harvest at village level and throughout Ouelessebougou, to a client base of resellers and consumers.
She expects to achieve an average profit of 195,000 FCFA per growing season.

The profits will enable her to reimburse her loan and also to help her husband with daily expenses.

loans.use: pay tilling costs, agricultural inputs and seeds

loans.name: Djantoyerela Group

texts.fr: Les femmes de Djantoyerela sont toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles. Elles ont en moyenne  39 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans le village de Sakoïba, dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali). Elles se sont connues à travers leurs activités génératrices de revenus, des liens de voisinage, de mariage et de parenté dans le village. Elles font le commerce d’arachide, du charbon de bois et du bois de chauffe. Dans le but d’acheter leurs marchandises, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 14ème cycle du prêt solidaire. Madame Ya (1ère  femme debout à gauche dans la photo,) est une vendeuse de charbon et de bois  dans le village de Sakoïba. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter  20 sacs de charbon de bois et 10 chargements de charrettes en bois de chauffe. La vente de ses marchandises se fait à Ségou au comptant à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 20.000 FCFA. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de prendre en charge certains besoins des enfants et de la famille.
texts.en: The women of Djantoyerela Group are all married in traditional families.  They have an average age of 39 and 4 children.  They all live in the village of Sakoiba, in the region of Segou, the fourth largest administrative region of Mali.  They know each other through their revenue-generating businesses and their neighborhood, marriage, and family ties.  They are in the business of groundnuts, charcoal, and firewood.  In order to buy their merchandise, the group members joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their 14th group loan.  Ms Ya (first woman standing at the left of the photo) is a seller of charcoal and firewood in the village of Sakoiba.  She plans to use her loan to buy 20 bags of charcoal and 10 cartloads of firewood.  She sells her goods in Segou for cash to male and female customers.  She expects to earn an average profit of 20,000 FCFA. This profit will enable her to take care of some of the needs of her children and her family.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and firewood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase beef tripe and slices of pork to make and sell pork rinds.

loans.name: Benkadi Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI II  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 30 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à MOUSSADJEBOUGOU, un des villages de OUELESSEBOUGOU, 2ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé à été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec   DIOBA , 2 ere assise de la gauche vers la droite  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0,5 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, au marché de OUELESSEBOUGOU, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 105.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The 10 members of the BENKADI II group are married women who average 30 years of age with four children, all living in polygamous families in Moussadjebougou, one of the villages in Ouelessebougou, second administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution  to carry out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their second loan with the institution, and the previous loan was repaid in full.

Dioba is the featured member, the second person sitting from left to right in the photo. She grows groundnuts. With her ​​loan, she intends to buy inputs, seeds and pay tilling costs to maintain 0.5 hectares (1.2 acres).

Production is sold after harvest at village level and at the Ouelessebougou market, to a client base of resellers and consumers. She expects to achieve an average profit of 105,000 FCFA per growing season.

The profits will enable her to reimburse her loan and also to help her husband with daily expenses.

loans.use: pay tilling costs, agricultural inputs and seeds

loans.name: Oumou

texts.fr:
Née en Août 1985 à Bamako, Oumou vit avec ses 3 enfants et son époux dans une  famille monogame dans le quartier KANGARE de la ville de SELINGUE. 
Oumou n’a pas eu la chance d’aller à l école,  très vite elle s’est  intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à la coiffure et à la vente des  produits de beauté. Après avoir correctement remboursé les prêts précédents, Oumou est à son quatrième  prêt avec Soro Yiriwaso qui sera utilisé pour acheter, une quantité  importante de mèches  et des produits beauté auprès des  grossistes à BAMAKO. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, à crédit et en détail dans sa boutique a KANGARE à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Oumou espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 100.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour   aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Born in August 1985 in Bamako, Oumou lives with her three children and her husband in a monogamous family in the Kangaré neighborhood of the city of Selingue.

Oumou has not had the chance to go to school. She quickly became interested in income-generating activities including hairdressing and the sale of beauty products. 

Having repaid previous loans, Oumou is on her fourth loan with Soro Yiriwaso, to be used to buy a large quantity of hair extensions and beauty products from wholesalers in Bamako. She sells retail for cash or credit at her shop in Kangaré, to a clientele composed of men and women.

Oumou hopes to make monthly profits of 100,000 FCFA that will be used to help her husband provide for the family, reimburse the loan and reinvest in the business.

loans.use: buy beauty products

loans.name: Estela Yamileth

texts.es:
Estela, es una joven emprendedora de 22 años de edad,  vive en casa de su mamá, ambas se dedican a actividades de comercio; su mamá se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado fresco y Estela se dedica a la venta de pupusas y le ayuda con el negocio a su mamá. 

Estela, solo tiene un nivel básico de estudio que  obtuvo en la escuela de su comunidad; luego dejo de estudiar ya que le era muy difícil seguir los estudios de bachillerato, por la distancia del instituto debía recorrer en auto bus unos 10 km y los gastos serian mayores se quedo en su casa y se acompaño por un tiempo; pero su compañero de vida la dejo cuando emigro a los EEUU y a perdido toda comunicación con él.
   
Ella es propietaria, de un pequeño negocio de venta de pupusas que vende por las tardes frente a su casa, desde hace 4  años trabaja de esa manera y a veces trabaja como empleada domestica, el negocio lo aprendió de su mamá que siempre se a dedicado a actividades comerciales y de un trabajo que tubo en un comedor en la parte baja de la laguna, al dejar ese trabajo decidió trabajar de forma independiente. Su mamá le apoya con el negocio por las tardes y ella le ayuda en la mañana con el negocio del pescado y los oficios domésticos de la casa.    

Anteriormente, Estela solicito un crédito a Fundación Campo, para instalar la pupuseria que hoy en día en su fuente de ingresos y satisfactoriamente le va muy bien, debido a que de las ganancias que ha ido obteniendo compro un cerdo de dos meses para engordarlo de los desperdicios de la pupuseria.

Hoy en día, esta solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar maíz, carne, repollos, salsas, aceite, el chimbo de gas propano, etc.  Para elaborar pupusas. Con el préstamo la cliente espera mantener el negocio existente y ampliar uno nuevo que consiste en la compra/venta de víveres( cosas de comida) que espera vender con sus vecinos ya que a visualizado una oportunidad de negocio con esta actividad mejorando así sus ingresos.   

 La cliente manifiesta que empezara con poco pero sueña con tener una tienda mas surtida algún día y tener de todo para la venta no solo víveres y construir un corredor grande en la parte frontal de la casa para ubicar el negocio de las pupusas ahí; ya que actualmente le toca sacar todos los días a la orilla de la calle la plancha de las pupusas  no tiene mesas para los clientes que la visitan.
texts.en:
Estela is an enterprising young woman of 22. She lives in her mother's house. Both of them have businesses: her mother works buying and selling fresh fish and Estela works selling pupusas [stuffed tortillas] and helps her mother with her business.

Estela only has a basic education that she received in her community school. Afterwards she stopped going to school because it was very difficult to continue with high school because of how far away the school was. She would have had to travel about 10 km by bus and the costs would have been high. Instead she stayed at home and was in a relationship for a period of time. But her partner left her when he emigrated to the United States and she has lost communication with him.
   
She is the owner of a small business selling pupusas, which she sells in the afternoons in front of her house. She has been doing this for four years and sometimes works as a housekeeper. She learned the business from her mother who has always engaged in commercial activities and from a job that she had in a canteen in the lower part of the lake. When she left this job she decided to work independently. Her mother helps her with the business in the afternoons and she helps her mother with the fish business and the housekeeping chores in the morning. 

Previously Estela sought a loan from Fundación Campo in order to start up the pupusa stand that is her current source of income. Things are going along very well since with her earnings she has purchased a two-month-old piglet to fatten with the leftover products from the tortilla stand.

Presently she is seeking a new loan in order to buy rice, meat, cabbage, sauces, oil, a propane cylinder, etc. in order to make pupusas. With the loan she hopes to maintain the existing business and add a new one that consists of the purchase/sale of supplies (food) which she hopes to sell with her neighbors, as she has recognized a business opportunity to increase her income with this activity.

The client states that she started out with little but that she hopes to have a better stocked store some day and carry all products for sale, not only groceries. She would like to build a large passageway in the front part of the house and locate her pupusa business there. Since she currently has to take the grill for the pupusas out to the edge of the street every day, she has no tables for customers who visit her.

loans.use: to purchase corn, meat, cabbage, sauces, oil, a propane gas cylinder, etc. in order to make pupusas [stuffed tortillas].

loans.name: Mahuklo 6 Group

texts.fr: MAHUKLO 6 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui résident dans le même village. La représente du groupe, nommée Fifamè Josiane (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 21 ans. Fifamè Josiane a fréquenté l’école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. Fifamè Josiane est mariée à un certain Enock. Le couple a un enfant à sa charge. Fifamè Josiane vit ensemble avec son mari et enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les charges du ménage. Pour ce faire, Fifamè Josiane exerce comme activité la vente de divers articles( sardines, lait, savon etc.), en plus de son activité vend également des fournitures scolaires. Fifamè Josiane s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de diversifier son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle Fifamè Josiane s’associe aux autres membres du groupe MAHUKLO 6 pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
MAHUKLO 6 is a group made up of  three women who are friends and who live in the same village.  The group's representative, Fifamè Josiane (raising her hand in the photo) is 21 years old.  She has attended school up to the secondary level and is married to a man named Enock.  She and her husband have one child in their care and jointly take care of the household's expenses.

In order to provide for her family, Fifamè Josiane sells various goods such as sardines, milk and soap, as well as school supplies.  She stocks up at a market located in Benin.

Eager to diversify her activity and to develop customer loyalty, Fifamè Josiane is requesting a first loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the MAHUKLO 6 group.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as sardines, milk, soap and school supplies.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa es una empresaria de éxito tiene 60 años de edad, viuda, con una hija mayor de 36 y dos nietos que están bajo su cargo de 06 y 03 años, su negocio es la elaboración y ventas de piñatas, bolsos de tela, esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 6 años, su hija le viene a ayudar hacer  las piñatas y los bolsos, tiene de ser cliente de la institucion3 años. Este crédito lo quiere para invertir materia prima como papel periódico en rehúso, papel, cartulina, papelillo, almidón y pega, para los bolsos tela, hilos, zíper, encajes, agujas, etc.
texts.en:
Rosa, 60, is a successful entrepreneur.  She's a widow and has an adult daughter, 36, and two grandchildren, ages 6 and 3, in her care.

Her business is making and selling piñatas and cloth handbags.  She has done this job for six years.  Her daughter helps her make the piñatas and bags.  She has been a client of the institution for three years.

She wants this loan to invest in raw materials such as newsprint, paper, cardboard, tissue paper, starch, and glue.  For the bags she needs fabric, thread, zippers, trim, needles, etc.

loans.use: to buy materials to make piñatas and handbags

loans.name: Midokpo Group

texts.fr:
Ces 3 voisines, qui se connaissent depuis plus de 20 ans, se sont réunies afin de solliciter un premier crédit auprès d'ALIDé
La représentante du groupe, Florence (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 50 ans et a eu 1 enfant avec Rigobert.
Elle est aujourd'hui divorcée et elle doit s'occuper seule de 3 personnes, 2 autres membres de sa famille lui ayant été mis à sa charge.

Afin d’assurer les charges de tout le monde, Florence, qui n'est jamais allé à l'école, est aujourd'hui vendeuse ambulante. Régulièrement, elle s'approvisionne au principal marché de sa ville en maïs et charbon pour aller les
revendre à travers toute la ville.
Avec ce prêt elle espère pouvoir développer son activité en achetant plus de marchandises et ainsi pouvoir mieux assurer les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
These three neighbors, who have know each other for more than twenty years, have joined together in order to seek their first loan through Alide. The representative of the group, Florence (whose hand is raised in the photo) is 50 years old and has one child with [a man named] Rigobert. She is now divorced, and has to take care of three people [by herself]; two members of her family are also under her care.

To be able to take care of everyone, Florence, who has never went to school, is a traveling merchant. Regularly, she procures corn and coal in a town market and then travels around the town to resell them. 

With this loan, she hopes to develop her business by buying more goods so she can better meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy corn and coal

loans.name: Colette's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représente du groupe, nommée Colette(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 43 ans. Colette n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Colette est mariée à un certain Jonas. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Le couple vit ensemble avec leur enfants. Colette et son mari assurent ensemble les charges du ménage. Pour ce faire, Colette vend divers articles(riz, sucre, sel etc.). Colette s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle Colette s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three people who all live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Colette (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 43 years old. Colette has never been to school. She is marred to a certain Jonas. The couple has three children, who all have been to school. The couple lives with their children, who are still under their care. Colette and her husband share the responsibility for the household expenses.

To do this, Colette sells various goods (like rice, sugar, salt, etc.). She procures her goods from a Benin market. 

In order to strengthen her business and promote customer loyalty, Colette has joined with the other members of this group to seek their first loan through Alide.

loans.use: to buy various goods (rice, sugar, salt, etc.)

loans.name: Kabba

texts.en:
This is 52-year-old Kabba. He is married, and has four children aged 23, 20, 16 and 14. He has one additional dependent, who lives with him and his wife.  In 1997, Kabba established his muslim caps and beads business. He began his business to enable him to solve his domestic problem. His business is located in the city center and his main customers are Muslim men and women. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 650,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. Kabba has already received and successfully repaid three loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy dozens of Muslims caps (Le 2,500,000) and dozens of Muslims beads (Le 1,500,000). He hopes that this loan shall increase his stock level and hence his additional income level. In the future, Kabba plans to complete his construction of his house, to educate his children and to rent a shop. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy Muslim caps and beads.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 41-year-old Mohamed. He is married and has four children aged 17, 14, 11 and 8. In 1999, Mohamed established his clothing and textile business. He began his business just to enable him to adequately take care of his family. His business is located in the city centre and his main customers are mostly men. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 600,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000.

Mohamed has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy jeans, trousers (Le 2,000,000), gent’s shirts (Le 1,000,000) and traveling boxes (Le 1,000,000). He hopes that this loan will increase his capital base. 

In the future, Mohamed plans to erect a house and to educate his children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy jeans, trousers, and shirts.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.fr: Daniel est homme de 43 ans et père  de 04 enfants dont l'âge varie entre entre de 08 et 18 ans. il fait dans le froid et la climatisation depuis 01 an  dans un quartier de la place. compte tenu de la petitesse de son capital,il est confronté à un problème constant  d'insatisfaction de la demande de sa clientèle.raison pour laquelle il sollicite un crédit pour acheter 04 bombones de gaz.ce qui lui permettra de satisfaire la clientèle et de réaliser un peu plus de bénéfices. lesquels lui permettront d'accroitre son activité et de diversifier ses activités eafin de mieux encadrer sa famille
texts.en:
Daniel is a 43-year-old man and a father of four children, who are between 8 and 18 years old. He has been in the cooling and air conditioning business for one year and works in a local area. 

Given his lack of capital, he is often unable to meet customer need. For this reason, he is seeking a loan to buy four gas cylinders. This will allow him to satisfy his customers and to earn a bit more. 

These extra earnings will allow him to expand and diversify his business in order to better support his family.

loans.use: to buy four gas cylinders

loans.name: Marcel Donwahoué

texts.fr:
Marcel est âgé de 38 ans, il vit au Bénin et est marié avec Antoinette qui est commerçante. Il vivent avec elle, leur 4 enfants, qui sont tous scolarisés, ainsi que 2 autres enfants de sa famille qui lui ont été confiés.

Il exerce passion le métier de coiffeur depuis plus de 15 ans maintenant. Il est reconnu dans tout son village pour son professionnalisme et sa gentillesse.

Depuis 4 ans, il emprunte régulièrement afin d'assumer les charges de sa famille et pouvoir offrir à ses enfants la chance qu'il n'a pas eu: aller à l'école. Il s'est notamment rendu compte que de nombreux clients venaient lui demandés du matériel de coiffure car aucun commerçant n'en vendant dans son village. Par ailleurs, il a aussi développé une activité de vente d'huile de palme.

Avec ce nouveau prêt de 350,000CFA, il investira 200,000CFA dans du matériel de coiffure et 150,000 CFA dans l'achat de noix de palme pour la transformation.

Les bénéfices générés lui permettront de renforcer son épargne afin de pouvoir réaliser son rêve: acheter une parcelle pour que ses enfants.
texts.en:
Marcel lives in Benin, is 38 years old, and is married to Antoinette, who is a merchant. Marcel lives with his wife and their four children, who have all been to school, as well as two other children from his family. 

For the last four years, he has borrowed regularly in order to ensure the needs of his family are met and to be able to offer his children an opportunity that he did not have: to go to school. 

Marcel has been a hairstylist for more than 15 years now. He is known through his village for his professionalism and his kindness. Many customers come to him wanting hairstyling products, because he is the only person selling such products in his village. 

Marcel has also started selling palm oil as a side business. 

With this new loan of 350,000 francs CFA, Marcel is going to invest 200,000 francs CFA in buying hairstyling products and 150,000 francs CFA in buying palm nuts to process [into oil].

Earnings will allow him to increase his savings in order to realize his dream of buying some land for his children.

loans.use: to buy hairstyling products and palm nuts

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es: Máximo tiene 62 años y esta casado con Victoria y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa construida a base de adobe. Máximo se dedica al transporte de pasajeros entre  distintos distritos de su localidad donde existe mucha demanda de pasajeros. Inicialmente alquilaba los vehículos que conducía para realizar el servicio colectivo pero gracias a sus ahorros logró adquirir su primera unidad propia. Máximo recorre diversas arterias de su zona transportando pasajeros con quienes muchas veces entabla amistades y hacen de su trabajo muy reconfortante. En ocasiones la lluvia es su principal inconveniente pues las vías por donde circula no son asfaltadas haciendo de su labor algo complicada. Con el paso de los años espera seguir trabajando con la motivación que lo caracteriza para cumplir sus objetivos el cual es renovar su unidad de transporte así como concretar la construcción de su vivienda a base de material noble. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con 1,000 nuevo soles para realizar un mantenimiento preventivo a su vehículo y tenerlo siempre en óptimas condiciones ya que es su principal herramienta de trabajo.
texts.en:
Maximo is 62 years old and he is married to Victoria.  They have 3 children and the family lives in a home made of adobe.  Maximo works in passenger transportation, moving people between different areas in the region, and there are a lot of people that need his services.  Initially, he rented the vehicles that he drove and operated a "colectivo" service, but thanks to his savings, he was able to buy his first vehicle.  

Maximo drives through various areas in the region, transporting passengers that sometimes become friends and that make his work comforting.  On occasion, the rain is inconvenient because many of the streets he uses are not paved, and this makes the driving more complicated.

As time goes by, he hopes to continue working because he is motivated to reach his goals, which are to repair his vehicle and also to improve his home's construction with better materials.  This is his first loan with Kiva and he is very thankful for the financial support that he is receiving so that he can get ahead.  Also, he promises to comply with the repayment schedule and to always pay punctually.  He is seeking a loan of 1,000 soles so that he can do preventive maintenance to his vehicle and to keep it in an optimal condition since it is his main source of income.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Doña Paula Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Paula mujer de 40 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos a cargos de 20,13 y 9 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, prendas de oro, prendas de plata, zapatos de varón, zapatos de mujer y cosa de horno, esto lo viene haciendo desde hace 15 años. Su hijo mayor le ayuda a vender y recuperar en su negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de oro, como cadenas, chapas, anillos de compromisos, anillos normales, pulseras de mano, pulsera de pie etc. con el crédito anterior logro pagar sus deudas y con las ganancias compro materiales de construcción para mejorar su casa de habitación además con el alquiler de tierras ya que también es agricultora en la siembra de esta temporada, Carolina tiene 40 años y su negocio es la venta de comida y sopa los fines de semanas e Iris su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon y  productos de  la Zermat, su edad es de 42 años.
texts.en: This group is made up of three members.  One of them is Paula, a 40 year old woman who is married and has three children, ages 20, 13 and 9.  Her business is selling Avon cosmetics, gold and silver jewelry, men's shoes, women's shoes, and stovetop items.  She has had this business for 15 years.  Her oldest son helps her with her business.  This loan will be used to purchase gold jewelry, such as necklaces, pendants, engagement rings, regular rings, bracelets, and anklets.  With the prior loan she was able to pay off her debts and with her profits she purchased construction materials to improve her home and rent land, as she is also farming this season.  Carolina is 40 years old and her business is selling meals and soup on the weekends.  Iris has a business selling Avon cosmetics and Zermat products.  She is 42 years old.

loans.use: to purchase gold items such as necklaces, pendants, engagement rings, regular rings, bracelets, and anklets.

loans.name: Las Mariposas De Los Solises Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cinco socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Orquidea socia de 35 años de edad, casada, con dos hijo de 17 y 14 años. Su negocio es la venta de fritanga todos los días en su domicilio y la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, Zermat etc., este crédito  lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de res, carne de pollo, plátanos verdes, plátanos maduros, repollo, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, sal, leñas, queso, cremas, etc. Gabriela tiene tiene 19 años su negocio es la venta de calzado, Crista tiene 23 años y su negocio es la venta de pescado crudo y frito, Paula tiene 45 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tortilla y Ana tiene 28 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida.
texts.en:
This group is composed of five resourceful members. Orquidea is one of them: she is 35 years old, she is married and she has two children aged 17 and 14. She sells “fritanga nicaragüense*” every day in her house; she also sells cosmetics by Avon, Zermat and other brands. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, beef, chicken, unripe and ripen bananas, cabbage, tomatoes, green bell peppers, onions, salt, firewood, cheese as well as creams and other cosmetics. Gabriela is 19 years old and she engages in selling shoes; Crista is 23 years old and she engages in selling uncooked and fried fish; Paula is 45 years old and she engages in selling tortillas; and Ana is 28 years old and she sells meals.

*A typical Nicaraguan dish

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, beef, chicken, unripe and ripen bananas, cabbage, tomatoes, green bell peppers, onions, salt, firewood, cheese as well as creams and other cosmetics.

loans.name: Soynica Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedora una de ellas es María tiene 51 años de edad, casada, con 6 hijos ya mayores, su negocio es la venta de ropa y servicios de moto taxis desde hace 8 años. Tienen de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 10 años. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa de paca variada y mixta, uno de sus logros con las ganancias que le genera su negocio logro ajustar para la compra de una moto taxis que le brinda servicio de transporte a la comunidad, María tiene 58 años y su negocio es la de tener un taller de costura y Luz tiene 52 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon.
texts.en: This group is made up of three entrepreneurs.  One of them is Maria. She is 51 years old, married, and has 6 adult children.  For 8 years she has had a business selling clothing  and a moto taxi service.  They have been clients of the bank for 10 years.  This loan will be used to purchase bundles of a variety of clothing.  With the profits from her business, she was able to save to buy a moto taxi to provide transportation service to the community.  Maria is 58 years old and she is a seamstress.  Luz is 52 years old and she sells Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to purchase of bundles of a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Yurina Group

texts.es: Grupo formado tres socios empresarios una de ella es Francis mujer de casada, de 23 años de edad, con tres  hijos de 2 , 11  y 3 años respectivamente, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, cosméticos de la Avon desde  hace tres años. Anteriormente trabajaba en la zona franca como obrera, fue apartando poco a poco de su salario hasta comprar cosméticos en pocas cantidades y las comercializabas a sus compañeros de trabajo sus productos, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos de la Avon como perfumen de varón, perfumen de dama, camisolas, camisas, chores, faldas, vestidos pequeños etc. Esthela tiene 47 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de prendas de plata y ropa nueva y Juan tiene 55 años y su negocio es la de una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members.  One is Francis.  She is married, 23 years old, and has children ages 2, 11, and 3.  Her business is sales of new clothing and Avon cosmetics.  She has had the business for 3 years.  She previously worked in the free trade zone as a laborer.  She set aside some of her wages bit by bit until she was able to purchase small quantities of cosmetics and sell them to her work colleagues.  She will use this loan to purchase Avon cosmetics such as men's cologne, women's perfume, camisoles, shirts, shorts, skirts, and short dresses.  Esthela is 47 years old and has business selling silver jewelry and new clothing.  Juan is 55 years old and has a snack shop in his home.

loans.use: to purchase Avon cosmetics for sale such as men's cologne, women's perfume, clothing such as camisoles, shirts, shorts, skirts, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Solidarias Group

texts.es: Este grupo está compuesto por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Adelfa mujer de 53 años, soltera con una hija de 25 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, Vogue, Zermat etc. desde hace 8 años. Este crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de cosméticos de la Avon como perfumen de varón, perfumen de mujer, lociones, máscaras, pintura de uñas, pintura de labios, cremas  para manos, cremas  para cuerpos, cremas faciales, cremas para pies etc. su hija y ella le ayudan a manejar el negocio, con las ganancias compro refrigeradoras y pago compromisos que tenía, Gema tiene 26 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y manualidades y Marbely tiene 27 años de edad y su negocio es de una librería.
texts.en: There are three successful entrepreneurial women in this group.  One is Adelfa.  She is 53 years old, single, and has a 25 year old daughter.  She has had a business selling cosmetics from Avon, Vogue, Zermat, etc. for 8 years.  This loan will be used to purchase Avon cosmetics such as men's cologne, women's perfume, lotions, mascara, nail polish, lipstick, hand cream, body cream, facial cream, and foot cream.  Her daughter helps her manage her business.  With their earnings they purchased refrigerators and paid off bills.  Gema is 26 years old and sells clothing and crafts.  Marbely is 27 years old and has a bookstore.

loans.use: to purchase Avon cosmetics such as men's cologne, women's perfume, lotions, mascara, nail polish, hand cream, body creams, facial creams, foot creams etc.

loans.name: Umaña Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de  ellas es Soledad, mujer soltera, tiene 45 años de edad, con una hija de 23 años de edad , su negocio es una pulpería con un año de iniciado su negocio, su hija es la que despacha y atiende el negocio, su crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos como arroz, aceite, frijoles, azúcar, carne de res, carne de pollo, sal, medicamentos populares, pan simple, pan dulce, cremas acida, productos  lácteos, vegetales, legumbres, etc. Juanita es otra socia tiene 28 años y su negocio es una pulpería y Yahaira tiene 22 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa y productos de bellezas.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful entrepreneurial women.  One of them is Soledad.  She is single, 45 years old, and has a 23 year old sdaughter.  Her business is a grocery store that she started one year ago.  Her daughter works at the business, attending to customers.  this loan will be used to purchase grains such as rice, cooking oil, beans, sugar, beef, chicken, folk remedies, bread, sweet bread, sour cream, dairy products vegetables, legumes, etc.  Juanita is another member of the group.  She is 28 years old and has a grocery store.  Yahaira is 22 years old and she sells clothing and beauty products.

loans.use: to purchase grains such as rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, chicken, salt, folk remedies, bread, sweet bread, sour cream, dairy products, vegetables, legumes, etc.

loans.name: Sandoval Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Reyna mujer de 48 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 22 y 26 años respectivamente su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos desde hace 5 años, tiene 3 años de ser cliente de la institución, su marido le ayuda a vender el producto el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa como camisas, pantalones de varón, pantalones de mujer, sabanas, zapatos, sandalias, bóxer, brasieres, bikinis, etc. El logro que obtuvo de los préstamos es que compro una refrigeradora, un televisor y un ropero, y logro pagar el préstamo. Lidia es otra integrante y su negocio es la venta de gaseosas y tiene 29 años de edad y Yaril tiene 21 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y variada.
texts.en: This group consists of three successful entrepreneurs.  One of them is Reyna, a 48-year-old woman with a common-law spouse and two children aged 22 and 26 respectively.  Her business for the past 5 years has been selling clothing and cosmetics.  She has been a client of this organization for 3 years.  Her husband helps her to sell her products.  She will use the loan to buy clothing such as shirts, men's pants, women's pants, sheets, shoes, sandals, boxers, bras, bikinis, etc.  Her achievement from previous loans has been to buy a fridge, a TV and a wardrobe, and to repay the loans. Lidia is another member whose business is selling soft drinks.  She is 29 years old. Yari is 21 years old, and her business is selling a variety of new clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as shirts, men's pants, women's pants, sheets, shoes, sandals, boxers, bras, bikinis, etc.

loans.name: Karen Masiel

texts.es: Karen es una microempresaria de éxito su negocio es la de una barbería unisex desde hace tres años, su edad es de 25 años, casada y con un hijo de 4 años. su negocio la apoya su esposo y una ayudante, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra en hacer unas mejoras al local del negocio como es el enverjar adelante, poner cerámica en el piso, comprar un espejo de pared grande y material de reposición.
texts.en: Karen is a successful micro-business woman. Her business is a unisex hair salon that she has had for three years. She is 25, married and has a 4 year old son. Her husband and one assistant help her with the business. She will invest the loan in making some improvements on the business locale such as the front gate, putting in a tile floor, buying a large wall mirror, and replacing some materials.

loans.use: to invest in making improvements on her locale, such as the front gate, putting in a tile floor, buying a large wall mirror and also to replace materials such as hair gel, peroxide, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Rosa tiene 32 años de edad casada, es una microempresaria de éxito, su negocio es la venta de zapatos desde hace 7 años consecutivos, tiene un hijo de 8 años, tiene ser cliente de la institución 5 años. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos de varón, sandalias, de diferentes edades y sexo.
texts.en:
Rosa, 32, is married and has a son, 8.  She's a successful micro-entrepreneur.  For seven years her business has been selling shoes.  She has been a client of the institution for five years.

She's going to invest this loan in buying men's shoes and sandals for males and females of different ages.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals

loans.name: Veronica Vanessa

texts.es: Verónica es una mujer emprendedora de éxito su negocio es la venta de ropa variada, cosméticos de la Avon, zapatos de varón, zapatos de mujer, ropa interior etc. tiene 34 años y tiene 7 años de tener su negocio, tres años de ser cliente de la institución, es acompañada con tres hijos de 15,13 y 10 años, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos de varón, zapatos de mujer, zapatillas, sandalias, plataformas, zapatos cerrados etc.
texts.en:
Veronica is a successful entrepreneur who sells a variety of clothing, Avon cosmetics, men and women's shoes and underwear, etc. 

Veronica is 34 years old and has been in business for 7 years. She is mother to children who are 15, 13 and 10 years old. She has been a client of this institution for 3 years.

She will invest this loan in the purchase of men's shoes, women's shoes, high heels, sandals, platform shoes, closed shoes, etc.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of men's shoes, women's shoes, high heels, sandals, platform shoes, closed shoes, etc.

loans.name: La Risita Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias una de ellas es Keylin tiene 25 años de edad, soltera y su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, su mama le ayuda a vender el producto, el crédito lo solicita para comprar paca de ropa variada en buen estado, paca mixtas, pacas de camisas, pacas de pantalón jean etc. María es otra de las socias y su negocio es la hecha y venta de tortillas tiene 33 años y Perla tiene 35 años y su negocio es la venta de nacatamales.
texts.en:
This group comprises three members, one of whom is Keylin. She is 25 years old and single. She runs a business selling used clothes. Her mother helps her sell her products. She is requesting this loan to buy bundles of various items of clothing in good condition. She will buy mixed bundles, bundles of shirts, bundles of jeans, etc. 
María is another member. Her business is making and selling tortillas. She is 33 years old. And Perla, who is 35 years old, is a member. Her business is the sale of “nacatamales” (Nicaraguan tamales).

loans.use: to buy mixed bundles of clothes, and bundles of shirts, bundles of jeans, etc.

loans.name: Las Orquideas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Jannette, mujer de 44 años de edad, soltera con tres hijos de 18, 16 y 14 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y variada, desde hace dos años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisas de varón, camisolas, chores, faldas, camisas de damas, trajes de niños etc., Aura es otra de las socias su negocio es la venta de fritanga y Lizeth tiene 18 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en: The group is made up of three members, one of whom is Janette, 44 years old. She is single and has three children 18, 16, and 14 years old. For the past two years, she has made a living selling a variety of clothing. She will use the loan to buy clothing such as men's and women's pants and shirts, tank tops, shorts, skirts, children's outfits, and so on. Aura, another member, sells fried foods, and Lisseth is 18 years old and sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as men's and women's pants and shirts, tank tops, shorts, skirts, children's outfits, and so on.

loans.name: Mariposa Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Jessica tiene 32 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos menores, el negocio es la venta de calzado, cosméticos de la Avon, este crédito lo solicita para invertir en la compra de ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisas de hombre, camisolas, faldas, chores, vestidos, etc., Darling tiene 21 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, calzados y la venta de hielo Liliam tiene 54 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon.
texts.en: This group is made up of three businesswomen. One of the members, Jessica, has 32 years old and is married with three young children. She sells shoes and Avon cosmetics. She will use this loan to buy clothing such as men's and women's pants, men's shirts, tank tops, skirts, shorts, dresses, and so on. Darling is 21 years old and has a business selling Avon cosmetics, shoes, and ice. Liliam is 54 años and she sells Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as men's and women's pants, men's shirts, tank tops, skirts, shorts, dresses, and so on.

loans.name: Chispa Group

texts.es: Este grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Sonia mujer de 48 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de plátano y venta de ropa usada desde hace un año, es acompañada, tiene 3 hijos de 18,19 y 20 años consecutivamente, su hija la mayor le ayuda a comprar la mercadería y a comercializarla, este crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de pacas de ropa mixtas, paca de pantalón jean, paca de camisas de varón etc. Yamileth tiene 32 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tortilla, frijoles cocidos, crema, cuajada y Luis tiene 42 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en: This group is made up of three members. One is Sonia, 48 years old, who has been selling bananas and used clothing for a year. She and her partner have three children 18, 19, and 20 years old. Her eldest daughter helps her buy and sell the merchandise. She will use this loan to buy bundles of assorted clothing, jeans, men's shirts, and so on. Yamileth is 32 years old and makes a living selling tortillas, cooked beans, cream, and yogurt. Luis is 42 years old and sells vegetables.

loans.use: to buy bundles of assorted clothing, jeans, men's shirts, and so on.

loans.name: Las Panteras Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres  socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Elda mujer de 30 años, acompañada, con tres hijos menores, desde hace 9 años su negocio es la venta y reparación de mantenedoras, junto a su compañero de vida en la cual el les brinda el mantenimiento y la reparación, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de repuestos y cajones que estén en mal estado para repararlos ponerles piezas nuevas, pintarlas, para luego su comercialización, Bertha tiene 38 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y variada, Ileana tiene 25 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos de la marca Arabela.
texts.en: This group consists of three entrepreneurial members.  One of them is Elda, who is 30 years old and has a common-law spouse and three minor children.  For 9 years she has worked selling and repairing refrigerators, together with her spouse who does the repairs and maintenance.  This loan will be used to buy spare parts and drawers that are in poor condition, in order to repair them, install new parts, paint them and then sell them.  Bertha is 38 years old, and her business is selling a variety of new clothing.  Iliana is 25 years old and her business is the sale of "Arabela" brand clothing and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and drawers in poor condition in order to repair them, install new parts and paint them.

loans.name: Las Divinas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cinco socios emprendedores una de ellas es Teresa tiene 50 años de edad, casada,  con dos hijos mayores, su negocio es la venta de donas, pasteles, y el destace de cerdo desde hace 5 años, su esposo y uno de los hijos mayores le ayudan al destace de los cerdos. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos en pie, para el destace, materia prima para hacer nacatamales como arroz, papas, achiote, vegetales, hoja de chagüites, mecates, etc, Ericka tiene 23 años de edad y su negocio es la compra y venta de chatarra, Lesbia tiene 35 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa, Meyling tiene 23 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de zapatos y Roberto su negocio es la venta de café y tiene 42 años de edad.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five members, one of them is Teresa. She is 50 years old, married with two grown children. Her business for the past five years has been selling donuts, cakes and butchering pigs. Her husband and one of her children help her butcher the pigs. His loan will be used to purchase live pigs, in order to butcher them and use them as a prime ingredient in making nacatamales with rice, potatoes, achiote (a spice), vegetables, wrapped in banana leaves. 
Erica is 23 years old, her business is buying and selling recyclable materials. Lesbia is 35 and she sells clothing. Meyling is 23 years old and sells shoes. Robert is 42 and his business is selling coffee.

loans.use: to buy live pigs, later butcher them and sell the meat in the market as a prime ingredient to make nacatamales (a traditional food made with rice, potatoes, achiote, vegetables and pork wrapped in banana leaves.

loans.name: Utr Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Rosa mujer de 49 años de edad, separada, con una hija de 24 años de edad. Su negocio es la venta de  ropa y artesanía típica desde hace 4 años se dedica a esta actividad. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de esta institución, quien ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de vestidos típicos, artesanías como copas, picheles,  vasos, barrilitos, hielera, floreros, sandalias, faldas típicas etc. Raquel mujer de 30 años su negocio es la  venta de ropa, cosméticos y Mercedes tiene 63 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de pan y ropa.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three enterprising partners. One of them is Rosa, a 49 year old woman, separated with one 24 year old daughter. Her business is selling traditional clothing and crafts; she has been doing so for the past 4 years. She has been a client of this institution for 4 years, and has demonstrated herself to be responsible in her payments. She will invest this loan in the purchase of traditional clothing and crafts such as cups, jugs, glasses, kegs, coolers, vases, sandals, traditional skirts, etc. 

Raquel, a 30 year old woman, has a business selling clothing and cosmetics, and Mercedes is 63 and sells bread and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase traditional clothing and crafts such as cups, jugs, glasses, kegs, coolers, sandals, traditional skirts, etc.

loans.name: Esfuerzo Del Mañana Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por  tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ella es Luisa mujer de 54 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de carne de res, ropa usada y leña desde hace 3 años inicio atraves de un prestamos lo que vino progresando reinvirtiendo sus ganancias, su hija le ayuda vender y a comprar su mercadería, el crédito lo invertirá en  la compra de ropa como chores, blusas de damas, camisetas, vestidos de damas, y realizar una mejora de su casa, Yessenia tiene 31 años su negocio es la de un taller de costura y Jessika tiene 31 años de edad y su negocio es la de un taller de costura y Jessica tiene 31 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de repostería y zapatos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful entrepreneurs, one of whom is Luisa, 54. She is married and has had a business selling beef, used clothing, and firewood for three years. She started her business with the help of a loan and made progress by re-investing her earnings. Her daughter helps her to buy and sell her merchandise. She will invest this loan in the purchase of clothing, such as shorts, women's blouses, T-shirts, and dresses. She will also make improvements to her home.

Yessenia is 31 years old. Her business is a sewing workshop. Jessika is also 31 years old and has a business selling pastries and shoes.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as shorts, women's blouses, T-shirts, dresses, etc. and to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Restauracion Group

texts.es: El grupo esta formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Marvell  mujer de 34 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos menores de 13 y 8 años. Su negocio es la venta de nacatamales desde hace 6 años, sus productos los comercializa en  su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en una librería y vender artículos escolares como cuadernos, lápices, lapiceros, cartulinas, papel crepe. Etc. Fátima mujer de 33 años y se dedica al negocio  de venta de tortillas y Kelin tiene 21 años y se dedica a la venta de nacatamales.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members, one of whom is Marvell, 34. She is in a common-law marriage with two children, ages 8 and 13. For six years, she has had a business selling nacatamales, a typical Nicaraguan dish made of filled corn dough wrapped in plantain leaves. She sells her products in her community. She has applied for a loan to invest in a bookstore where she will sell school supplies such as notebooks, pencils, pens, card stock, crepe paper, etc. 

Fátima, 33, has a business selling tortillas. Kelin, 21, makes a living selling nacatamales.

loans.use: to buy products for her bookstore, such as notebooks, pencils, pens, card stock, crepe paper, etc.

loans.name: Primera Vez Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios exitosos  uno de ellos es Juana mujer de  43 años de edad, acompañada. Su negocio es compra y venta de cosechas desde hace 15 años. Sus productos los comercializa en el mercado. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cosechas de mamon. Héctor hombre de 66 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de leña y Mercedes mujer de 33 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en: The group is formed by three successful associates, one of whom is Juana, a woman who is 43 years old and in a relationship. For the past 15 years, her business has been the purchase and sale of crops. She sells her products in the market. She is requesting the loan to purchase lychee fruit. Hector is a 66-year-old man and his business is the sale of firewood, and Mercedes is a 33-year-old woman and her business is the sale of clothes.

loans.use: to purchase lychee fruits.

loans.name: Manito Poderosa Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores  uno de ellos es Leyla mujer de 27 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de 10 y 6 años. Su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 10 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de sacos de papa, cebolla, chayote, ayote, zanahoria. Mayra mujer de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de verduras y Nelson hombre de 23 años y su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members, one of whom is Leyla, 27. She is married with two children, ages 6 and 10. She has had a business selling fruits and vegetables for ten years. She has applied for a loan to buy sacks of potatoes, onions, pear squash, pumpkins, and carrots.

Mayra, 34, and Nelson, 23, both have businesses selling vegetables.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, such as sacks of potatoes, onions, pear squash, pumpkins, carrots, etc.

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios empresarios uno de ellos es Ivania mujer de 40 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 20 y 15 años. Su negocio es la venta de granos básicos  desde 4 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de quintales de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, bidones de aceite, cajas de jabones, shampoo, papel higiénico, etc. Dora mujer de 49 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de verduras y Leddy hombre de 23 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de condimento.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Ivania, 40.  She's married and has two children, ages 20 and 15.  She has been selling basic grains for four years.

She'll invest her loan in buying rice, sugar, beans, cans of oil, boxes of soap, shampoo, toilet paper, etc.

Dora's a 49-year-old woman who sells vegetables.  Leddy's a 23-year-old man who sells condiments.

loans.use: to buy staples

loans.name: Santa Ana Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado tres socias empresarias de éxito una de ellas es Marta mujer de 42 años de edad, casada con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de repostería  desde hace 4 años. Vende sus productos en uno de los mercados de Managua. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de inventario para su venta como canelado, torta de leche, rosquillas rivenses, gabacheras bordadas, delantales bordados y delantales normales. Ana tiene 47 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de cosa de horno y Marbely tiene 29 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa íntima de mujer.
texts.en: This group consists of three successful woman entrepreneurs.  One of them is Martha, who is 42 years old and married with two cildren.  Her business for 4 years has been the sale of pastries .  She sells her products in one of the markets in Managua.  She has been a client of the organization for 5 years.  The loan will be used to buy inventory for her sales, such as cinnamon pastries, milk cake, donuts, embroidered aprons and plain aprons.  Ana is 47 years old and her business is selling Nicaraguan corn cake.  Marbely is 29 years old, and her business is selling women's lingerie.

loans.use: to buy cinnamon pastries, milk cake, donuts, embroidered aprons and plain aprons

loans.name: La Realidad Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por seis socios emprendedores de éxitos uno de ellos es José hombre de 47 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de tamales desde hace 12 años. Vende sus productos en su comunidad, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de productos para la elaboración tamales pisques como cal, maíz, hojas de chaguites, leña etc Marlin tiene 29 años de edad, su negocio es un pulpería, Juan hombre de 52 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tamales pisques, Nubia tiene 61 años de edad su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, María mujer de 24 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de tamales y Johana tiene 29 años de edad y su negocio es la  venta de tamales.
texts.en:
The group is formed by six successful, entrepreneurial associates, one of who is José. He is 47 years old, in a relationship, and has two children. For the past 12 years, his business has been the sale of tamales. 
 
He sells his products in his community. He is requesting the loan in order to purchase products for making tamales pisques (tamales with a bean filling), like lime powder, corn, banana leaves, firewood, etc. 

Marlin is 29 years old, and her business is a convenience store, Juan is 52 years old and his business is the sale of tamales pisques, Nubia is 61 years old and her business is the sale of nacatamales (a dish similar to a tamal), María is 24 years old and her business is the sale of tamales, and Johana is 29 years old and her business is the sale of tamales.

loans.use: to purchase basic necessities like lime powder, corn, bananas, firewood, etc.

loans.name: La Confianza Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cinco socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Mercedes Hombre de 53 años de edad, soltero. Su negocio es la venta de tamales donde lo distribuye personalmente en el mercado desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para para la compra de  un quintal de maíz , fletes de leña, hojas de chaguites, cal, sal etc. Concepción  mujer de 46 años de edad su negocio es la venta de flores y tamarindo, Dora tiene 26 años de edad, su negocio es una pulpería, Esperanza mujer de 51 años de edad, su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas y Margarita tiene 49 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tamales.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five enterprising members. One of them is Mercedes, a 53-year-old single man. His business is selling tamales. He has been distributing them personally in the market for twenty years. He is requesting the loan in order to purchase a quintal of corn, firewood, banana leaves, lime, salt, etc.

Concepción, a 46-year-old woman, has a business selling flowers and tamarind. Dora is 26 years old and has a grocery store. Esperanza is 51 years old and has a business buying and selling fruit. Margarita is 49 years old and her business is selling tamales.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as lime, salt, banana leaves, firewood, and a quintal of corn

loans.name: Dios Es Mi Fortaleza Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias empresarias una de ella es Johana mujer de 42 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos a su cargo de 23, 19 y 4 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, comida y fresco desde hace 6 años inicio su negocio con un préstamo, vende sus productos ambulante en la ciudad de León. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años y el crédito lo solicita para compra de mercadería como es pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, zapatos, pantalones de damas, etc. Blanca mujer de 57 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida, gaseosa, repostería, fresco, helado y Yamileth tiene 31 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida, fresco, repostería y gaseosa.
texts.en: This group consists of three entrepreneurial members.  One of them is Johana, who is 42 years old and is married with three children under her care, aged 23, 19 and 4.  Her business is selling new clothing, food and soft drinks.  She started her business 6 years ago with a loan, and works as a mobile vendor in the city of Leon.  She has been a client of this organization for 5 years.  She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, shoes, women's pants, etc.  Blanca is 57 years old and her business is selling food, soft drinks, sweets, and ice cream.  Yamileth is 31 years old and her business is selling food, soft drinks and sweets.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, shoes, women's pants, etc.

loans.name: Lourdes Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Claudia mujer de 30 años de edad, acompañada con cuatro hijos menores  de 15, 13, 12, y 8 años. Su negocio es la venta de gallina preparada y viva desde hace 6 años, su productos los comercializa en el mercado de Masaya.
